CONNECTIVITY
CONFERENCE
RIYADH Dear customers and partners, We are pleased to invite you to the GoDirect Connectivity Conference <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/april/godirect-connectivity-conference-riyadh]]> taking place on April 30 in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Meet the Middle East Honeywell GoDirect team and join the dialog about latest technologies and the future of the Connected Aircraft.
Venue: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel, Northern Ring Rd, Al Wadi Ar Riyadh, Riyadh, 11552, Saudi Arabia
Time: 8:30 – 14:00 on April 30, 2018
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/april/godirect-connectivity-conference-riyadh]]>
WHY YOU SHOULD ATTEND
Learn about Connectivity Solutions
We will highlight Honeywell’s Connectivity solutions covering all hardware and services, including the latest upgrades, STC's, and mandates.
Find out About HAPP's Advantages
Now you can protect yourself against the burden of unexpected maintenance costs with the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP).
Get the Latest on Cyber Security
Honeywell GoDirect Cyber Protection solution will help you protect your aircraft against cyber threats.
View complete agenda <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2018/april/godirect-connectivity-conference-riyadh]]>
Looking forward to meeting you in Riyadh!
Tim Jensen Connectivity Sales Manager Middle East Tim.Jensen@Honeywell.com
